author: christ1an
content: I'm looking forward to it. This fascinates me equally as much as you.

author: david.kierznowski
content:
I remember watching these a while back, really well done; although these kind of vids remind me alot of World war 2 propoganda. How easy is it for rival companies to release this kind of material via youtube and other social networks. 

Amidst all this information, a man needs to remain somewhat objective :)

author: w00h00
content:
Have you been watching britney sex tapes on youtube?
I think youtube is leaking data on what you have been watching and what not.

author: pdp
content: w00h00, I am speechless... where the heck that came from?

author: psudobuddha
content: youtube is hevily entergrated with google (and vise.) seems like an awkward platform for these videos to be presented on.

author: pdp
content:
psudobuddha,

there is nothing wrong about these videos. they are only representing a different point of view, which Google might not like. if Google censor them, that will put some serious questions about their entire politics. i don't think that will happen, though.

author: MustLive
content:

MOSEB-20 Bonus: Google dorks strikes back

About the power of Google to put their users into the risk.

author: pdp
content:

that was actually very interesting find :)
